channel.title: Me on Kushal Vajrala
channel.description: Recent content in Me on Kushal Vajrala

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: or, a first timer’s journey messing with static sites. What is Hugo? The Goal Installation Site Creation Showing off your literary masterpieces Final Thoughts What is Hugo? Link to heading I’ll just link them for you and save you the trouble of having to read my own paraphrasing. I can’t resist, however: it’s essentially an open source service that helps you generate static websites. Documentation, blogs, portfolios, you name it. I was inspired by Zoe’s blog and wanted to create my own.
